data.meta_site_name: William Roberts, Sr. Obituary | December 15, 2020 | Summerville, SC
data.text:
William Jerry Roberts Sr., 83, of Summerville, widower of Nada Jean Roberts, passed away Tuesday, December 15, 2020.

William was born on June 9, 1937 in Tabor City, NC. He was the son of Ellis Roberts and Irene Strickland. He was a Shriner, member of the Hillbilly Clan of Pikeville and Fraternal Order of Police. He honorably served in the United States Army.

He leaves behind his sons; Jerry Roberts (Jennifer) of Summerville, SC, and Tracy Roberts (Kathleen), of Pinopolis, SC; his daughter, Staci Roberts Parker (Scott), of Lillington, NC; his brothers, Larry Roberts of Statesboro, GA, Patrick Roberts of Hanahan, SC, Bill Roberts (Teddy) of San Tan Valley, AZ and Charles Tuberville (Brenda) of Copperas Cove, TX; his grandchildren, Stacee Rowell (Blake), Shayna Cotton (Nicholas), Zachary Roberts, Alex Roberts (Amanda) and Benjamin Parker. In addition to his parents and wife, he is predeceased by his sister, Joye Roberts Turbeville , and his brothers, Benjamin Franklin Roberts, Harold Douglas Roberts, Edwin H Roberts, William Walker Roberts, and Tim McCoy “Jimmie” Roberts.

In lieu of flowers, memorials can be made to Dorchester Paws (https://dorchesterpaws.org/give-today) in memory of Bobby Roberts and AJ, his constant companion or St. George Episcopal Church (https://www.stgeorge-sc.org/online-giving).

Arrangements by Parks Funeral Home, 130 West 1st North Street, Summerville, SC 29483. www.parksfuneralhome.com
